Body: What are the differences between these three kinds of case? How do we know that they are real? I kind of understand that inherent and lexical case are idiomatic and lead to variation in case marking, but I do not understand how they are different from each other. I read about them in this paper but did not fully understand.
Title: What are the differences between inherent, lexical and structural case?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: I'm studying computational linguistics at Brigham Young University. I work with linguistic cognitive modelling and automated language testing.

OwnerUser.AboutMe: I'm studying computational linguistics at Brigham Young University. I work with linguistic cognitive modelling and automated language testing.
